query:
WITH new_session AS (
                  INSERT INTO recurring_session (
                    category_id,
                    description,
                    start_minute_offset,
                    end_minute_offset,
                    template_id,
                    user_id
                  )
                  VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)
                  RETURNING id
                )
                INSERT INTO tag_to_recurring_session (tag_id, session_id)
                SELECT tag_id, new_session.id
                FROM new_session, unnest($7::uuid[]) AS tag_id
